Accession	Q9UN30;B0FZN6;B2RA08;Q5H968;Q5H969
EntryName	SCML1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Sex comb on midleg-like protein 1
GeneName	SCML1
Length	208
Function	Putative Polycomb group (PcG) protein. PcG proteins act by forming multiprotein complexes, which are required to maintain the transcriptionally repressive state of homeotic genes throughout development. May be involved in spermatogenesis during sexual maturation (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
